name: UFbxMeshImportData
doc: Import data and options used when importing any mesh from FBX

bTransformVertexToAbsolute: If this option is true the node absolute transform (transform, offset and pivot) will be apply to the mesh vertices.
bBakePivotInVertex: - Experimental - If this option is true the inverse node rotation pivot will be apply to the mesh vertices. The pivot from the DCC will then be the origin of the mesh. Note: "TransformVertexToAbsolute" must be false.
NormalImportMethod: Enabling this option will read the tangents(tangent,binormal,normal) from FBX file instead of generating them automatically.
NormalGenerationMethod: Use the MikkTSpace tangent space generator for generating normals and tangents on the mesh
bReorderMaterialToFbxOrder: If checked, The material list will be reorder to the same order has the FBX file.
bImportMeshLODs: If enabled, creates LOD models for Unreal meshes from LODs in the import file; If not enabled, only the base mesh from the LOD group is imported
bComputeWeightedNormals: Enabling this option will use weighted normals algorithm (area and angle) when computing normals or tangents
